prompt.expectations: I expected to get  some ideas about test automation framework that can be used for automated test creation.
prompt.examplePrompt:
"Suggest automation frameworks that can help me automate this endpoint https://petstore.swagger.io/#/user/updateUser"
"Compare them and suggest what can be used in case if I want to have only API tests and don't need UI tests."
prompt.sideEffectsOrComments: It provided a few popular popular test automation frameworks. After additional requirements were provided, it correctly updated the list. It provided some comparison.

assessment.comments: The response was good and it mentioned a couple of good tools. The prompt can be optimised to make it produce better & more accurate results.

1.revisedPrompt:
"Suggest automation frameworks that can help me automate this endpoint https://petstore.swagger.io/#/user/updateUser"
"Compare them and suggest what can be used in case if I want to have only API tests and don't need UI tests."

2.revisedPrompt: Suggest automation frameworks that can help me automate this endpoint 'https://petstore.swagger.io/#/user/updateUser'. Compare them and suggest what can be used in case I want only API tests and don't need UI tests.

3.revisedPrompt: Suggest automation frameworks that can help me automate this endpoint 'https://petstore.swagger.io/#/user/updateUser'. Compare them and suggest what can be used in case I want only API tests and don't need UI tests.

4.revisedPrompt: Act as a Senior Quality Engineer. Design test cases from the following endpoint 'https://petstore.swagger.io/#/user/updateUser'.
4.changeLog: Rephrased the prompt to produce better results.

5.revisedPrompt: Act as a Senior Quality Engineer. Design test cases from the following endpoint '{{ENDPOINT}}'.

6.revisedPrompt: Act as a Senior Software Development Engineer in Test. Design test cases from the following endpoint '{{ENDPOINT}}'.
